title: Monday's Glance, Scoreboard
text: COLLEGE GOLF — WWU men at College of Idaho Invitational, 11:30 a.m. Tuesday COLLEGE GOLF — WWU men at College of Idaho Invitational, 11:30 a.m. PREP SOCCER — La Grande girls at Mac-Hi, 2 p.m.; La Grande boys at Mac-Hi, 4 p.m.; Wa-Hi girls at Southridge, 7 p.m. PREP VOLLEYBALL — Ione volleyball at Helix, 6 p.m.; Waitsburg at WWVA, 6 p.m.; DeSales at Prescott, 6 p.m.; Dayton at Asotin, 6 p.m.; Pomeroy at Garfield-Palouse, 6 p.m.; Oakesdale at Touchet, 6 p.m.; La Grande Mac-Hi, 6 p.m.; Kennewick at Wa-Hi, 7 p.m. TELEVISION Today EURO SOCCER QUALIFYING — Russia vs. Montenegro, 8:50 a.m. (ESPN2); Ukraine vs. Spain, 11:30 a.m. (ESPN2); PRO BASEBALL — Kansas City Royals at Houston Astros, 10 a.m. (FS1); Toronto Blue Jays at Texas Rangers, 1 p.m. (FS1); St. Louis Cardinals at Chicago Cubs, 3 p.m. (TBS); Los Angeles Dodgers at N.Y. Mets, 5:30 p.m. (TBS). PRO FOOTBALL — Pittsburgh Steelers at San Diego Chargers, 5 p.m. (ESPN). PRO BASKETBALL — Preseason, Portland Trail Blazers at Utah Jazz, 6 p.m. (ROOT). Tuesday PRO BASEBALL — St. Louis Cardinals at Chicago Cubs, 1:30 p.m. (TBS); Los Angeles Dodgers at N.Y. Mets, 5 p.m. (TBS). COLLEGE FOOTBALL — Arkansas State at South Alabama, 5 p.m. (ESPN2). PRO HOCKEY — Tampa Bay Lightning at Detroit Red Wings, 4:30 p.m. (NBCSN). PRO BOXING — Gerald Washington vs. Amir Mansour, 6 p.m. (FS1). UEFA EUROPEAN QUALIFIER SOCCER — Czech Republic at Netherlands, 11:30 a.m. (ESPN2); Norway at Italy, 11:30 a.m. (FS1). INTERNATIONAL SOCCER EXHIBITION — Men, Costa Rica at United States, 3:55 p.m. (ESPN).
